message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $18,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $14,000 is still a bit out of my budget. How about we try $11,500? I'm really interested in the product and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
